hypothesis_content.title: Stress-to-Neutral Recovery via Spot CVD Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regimes, when BTC price makes a lower low but Cumulative Volume Delta (CVD) on spot markets shows a higher low over the same period, and exchange netflows turn positive (>+5k BTC in 3 days), the market will transition to NEUTRAL regime within 5 days with 68% accuracy.
hypothesis_content.rationale: CVD divergence during stress indicates accumulation despite price weakness. Positive exchange netflows confirm coins moving to cold storage (not for sale). This combination signals selling exhaustion and prepares regime transition once liquidation cascades complete.
entry_conditions: Spot CVD makes 3-day higher low (bullish divergence)
Exchange netflows positive (>+5,000 BTC aggregate over 3 days)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price closes below CVD divergence low

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Divergence signals fail to produce NEUTRAL transition >40% of time OR average continuation of stress regime >10 days post-signal.
